bug.description:

OpenCV => master
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
They are handled in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/master/modules/viz/src/widget.cpp#L123>cv::viz::Widget::setRenderingProperty</denchmark-link>
but are missing in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/master/modules/viz/src/widget.cpp#L189>cv::viz::Widget::getRenderingProperty</denchmark-link> . The original implementers forgot two case-statements to handle these two properties.
